Doc2VecFE module

class src.model_classes.Doc2VecFE.Doc2VecFE(data)[source]

Bases: FeaturesExtractor

get_extractor_params()[source]

Getter for the param data :return: a copy of the content of the data param

set_extractor_params(new_params)[source]

For Doc2Vec extractor we cannot set the params in this way. The params are set at initialization. If you want to change the params, it is mandatory to retrain the model again - so there would be a new model :param new_params: the new input variable

short_str()[source]

Name of the class :return: string with the name of the class :rtype: build-in python string

transform_data(data)[source]

Method to transform df/list with str elements in a list of lists with the features :param data: pandas data frame series (the row is single str) or built-in list with str elements :return: list of lists with numerical values/feature (the values are scaled to be positive values) :rtype: build-in python list
